p: The whole plant is used to treat dermatological disorders, immune problems, digestive ailments, intestinal troubles, colds, and coughs [ 7, 8, 29]. The leaves of T. satureioides are mainly known to be used against metabolic disorders, in particular diabetes [ 9, 12, 31], as well as for the treatments of bloating and diarrhea [ 32] or against cooling, pharyngitis, cough, and influenza [ 10].
